com.nutiteq.vectorlayers
Class VectorLayer<T extends VectorElement>

java.lang.Object
  com.nutiteq.layers.Layer
      com.nutiteq.vectorlayers.VectorLayer<T>
Type Parameters:
T - vector element type for this layer.
Direct Known Subclasses:
BillBoardLayer, GeometryLayer, NMLModelLayer, Polygon3DLayer
public abstract class VectorLayer<T extends VectorElement>
extends Layer

The abstract layer class, inherited by all layers that contain some sort of vector data. Contains methods for adding and removing new vector data.

Method Detail

clear

public void clear()
Remove all elements from layer. Note: only locally added elements are removed, data source is not changed.

add

public void add(T element)
Add a new element to layer. Note: element is only added locally and not to the data source.

Parameters:
element - the new element to be added

addAll

public void addAll(java.util.Collection<? extends T> elements)
Add collection of elements to the layer. Note: elements are only added locally and not to the data source.

Parameters:
elements - the collection of elements to be added

remove

public void remove(T element)
Remove an existing element from the layer. Note: only locally added elements can be removed, data source is not changed.

Parameters:
element - the element to be removed

removeAll

public void removeAll(java.util.Collection<? extends T> elements)
Remove collection of elements from the layer. Note: only locally added elements can be removed, data source is not changed.

Parameters:
elements - the collection of elements to be removed

elementUpdated

@Deprecated
public void elementUpdated(VectorElement element)
Deprecated. 

getDataExtent

public Envelope getDataExtent()
Get the extent of all elements in the layer. Extent includes all added elements plus all elements from the data source (if specified).

Returns:
tight envelope containing all layer elements

getDataSource

public VectorDataSource<T> getDataSource()
Get layer datasource.

Returns:
active data source or null if datasource is not set.

getVisibleElements

public java.util.List<T> getVisibleElements()
Get list of visible element. This method is intended for subclasses and renderers.

Returns:
list of visible elements. Can be null.

setVisibleElementsList

@Deprecated
public void setVisibleElementsList(java.util.List<T> visibleElementsList)
Deprecated. 

Set visible elements list. This method is intended for subclasses. It should be called at the end of calculateVisibleElements(). Note: after calling this method, caller MUST NOT modify the list anymore. Note: this function is deprecated, use setVisibleElements instead.

Parameters:
visibleElementsList - list of visible elements.

setVisibleElements

public void setVisibleElements(java.util.List<T> visibleElements)
Set visible elements list. This method is intended for subclasses. It should be called at the end of calculateVisibleElements(). Note: after calling this method, caller MUST NOT modify the list anymore.

Parameters:
visibleElements - list of visible elements.

calculateVisibleElements

public void calculateVisibleElements(Envelope envelope,
                                     int zoom)
This method is intended for culling task. Note: as this function is called from a different thread, all data accessed here should be synchronized.

updateVisibleElements

public void updateVisibleElements()
Not part of public API. Request the update of visible elements list.
